### 1.Installation
###### (For Arch Linux)
##### ðŸ‘‡ - Copy the following lines to the clipboard and paste them into your terminal - ðŸ‘‡

```
sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tgbiztank/dotfiles/main/install.sh)"
```

### 2.Information
This repository was created to store my personal dotfiles. I hope you enjoy it!
*   **Browser**: [Chrome](https://www.google.com/chrome/index.html)
*   **OS**: [Arch Linux](https://archlinux.org/download/)
*   **Shell**: [Zsh](https://sourceforge.net/projects/zsh/files/latest/download)
*   **Terminal**: [Terminator](https://github.com/gnome-terminator/terminator)
*   **Text Editor**: [Neovim](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/)
*   **WM**: [i3-gaps](https://i3wm.org/downloads/)

<h3 id="key">3.Keymaps</h3>

###### Super key is Windows/Command from your keyboard.
##### 1. Execute programm
<table>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th align="center"><strong>-</strong></th>
      <th align="center"><strong>Keybinds</strong></th>
      <th align="center"><strong>Actions</strong></th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>1.1</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + B</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Browser</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>1.2</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + T</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Terminal Emulator</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

##### 2. System
<table>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th align="center"><strong>-</strong></th>
      <th align="center"><strong>Keybinds</strong></th>
      <th align="center"><strong>Actions</strong></th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>2.1</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Control + Space</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Change input method</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>2.2</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Control + Shift + E</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Exit i3-gaps</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>2.3</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Control + Shift + R</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Restart i3-gaps</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>2.4</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + F</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Search Application</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>2.5</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Scoll Lock</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Transparent</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>2.6</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + Shift + S</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Screenshot</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>2.7</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + F1</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Mute toggle</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>2.8</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + F2</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Volume Down</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>2.9</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + F3</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Volume Up</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

<table>

      <td align="center"><strong>3.5</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + L</kbd></td>

      <td align="center"><strong>3.8</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + Shift + K</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Move Window Up</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>3.9</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + Shift + J</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Move Window Down</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>3.10</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + Shift + H</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Move Window Left</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>3.11</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + Shift + L</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Move Window Right</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>3.12</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Move Floating Window With Mouse</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>3.13</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + Shift + X</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Show Hidden Window</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>3.14</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + Tab</kbd></td>

    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center"><strong>3.15</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + Minus</kbd></td>
      <td align="center">Zoom In</td>
    </tr>

      <td align="center"><strong>3.16</strong></td>
      <td align="center"><kbd>Super + Plus</kbd></td>
